column4: I want to remove captive NTFS from my operating system.  I don't know how though.  Could someone *please* help me?  It's killing the performance of the OS.
By "captive" NTFS what do you mean? A mounted partition?
Nevermind, just looked it up, read write NTFS package. If you installed it by deb package just do apt-get remove --purge <exact package name here>
:) cool. Like a name you have on the tip of your tongue then it comes to you
